title: Lower Priority queue because of game crashes
body: Recently i receive a lower priority queue because of afk games, the game crashed and wouldn't let me relaunch the game which forced my team to re-make a game and only after they remake i could launch the game. Is there anyway my lower priority queue can be revoked???? This isn't fair

replies.body: Look at the response from Riot. This is a company?
At this point i'm really disappointed that it's a re-occuring problem that I have, because now i can't have normal games where i don't crash and constantly keep receiving time penalties

This happened yet again, i start a game and it completely starts crashing on me for no apparent reason, and by the time i fix it my team already remade when my team-mate tells them to not remake this i ridiculous riot come on

I can confirm this because we were supposed to be in a duo ranked game. He couldn't load into the game so my team had to remake. He is down to 73 lp right now and supposed to be in promos. Riot, please fix your shit up.

Unfortunately, we're unable to modify Leaverbuster penalties for any reason. A key component as to why this is the case is because regardless of intent, your absence from the match negatively impacts **everyone**. This is why the system treats all disconnections equally, regardless of the reason for the disconnection.

If you can give me a more detailed description of your crash, I can suggest steps to take in order to mitigate the chances of it happening again.
